title: Is selling Apple AirPods Pro for $100? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nope, those are counterfeit and the market is flooded with them so be careful cause so far they have manage to imitate/simulate most of the features, some even have valid serial numbers (at least until they are reported) currently the only things they can’t replicate/simulate are: the AirPods info showing up on the settings->About screen of your iPhonethe fit test fails when pressedThe spatial audio feature is completely missing along with the demo buttonand sure they are cheap and you get what you pay for but at least me wouldn’t risk putting something on my face that has a battery of which I don’t even know the quality of it
